name: StoryAction
summary: Represents action sheduled for something (for example NPC)

setLavel.summary: Changes action's label to provided one. Returns this storyaction

getLavel.summary: Returns label assigned to this action

logMe.summary: Logs this CogMaster object in minecraft logs

toString.summary: Same as running Cogwheel.str passing this object as argument

equals.summary: Check if provided object equals to this object
